1.title: Dermot Kennedy

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: A native of County Dublin, singer-songwriter Dermot Kennedy began writing songs in his teens. The current NPR Slingshot artist stopped by WGBH's Fraser performance studio on a blazing hot August afternoon to perform a powerfully intimate set featuring two songs on guitar and two on piano.

2.title: Marcus King

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Marcus King performs acoustic versions of songs off his third full-length album, Carolina Confessions, live at WGBH's Fraser Performance Studio. King recorded the album with producer Dave Cobb (Chris Stapleton, Sturgill Simpson, John Prine, Jason Isbell) at Nashville's iconic RCA Studio A.

3.title: J.S. Ondara

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: J.S. Ondara performs a live acoustic set in WGBH's Fraser Performance Studio. The 2018 NPR Slingshot artist grew up in Nairobi, Kenya and moved to Minneapolis, Minnesota in 2013 out of admiration for his musical hero (and native Minnesotan), Bob Dylan. Ondara learned English both in school and through his love of artists like Nirvana, Neil Young, and Bob Dylan.

4.title: Guster

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Guster stopped by WGBH's Fraser Performance Studio for a stripped-down performance of some new songs as well as an interview with Boston Public Radio's Jim and Margery. The alt-rock band's eighth studio album, Look Alive is a continuation of the band's commitment to evolving their sound with each new album.

1.title: The Meadows Brothers

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: The Meadows Brothers live at WGBH's Fraser Performance Studio, Boston, MA, including interview with Ian and Dustin.

2.title: Hayley Sabella

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Interview and full performance by Boston-based singer-songwriter, Hayley Sabella, at WGBH's Fraser Performance Studio.

3.title: The Novel Ideas

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Boston-based country folk quintet The Novel Ideas perform live at WGBH's Fraser Performance Studio.

4.title: Tanya Donelly

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Tanya Donelly (Throwing Muses, The Breeders, Belly) performs four songs from her multi-part release "Swan Song Series" live at WGBH's Fraser Performance Studio in Boston.

5.title: Air Traffic Controller

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Air Traffic Controller perform three songs from their 2016 album Black Box live at WGBH's Fraser Performance Studio in Boston.

6.title: Dropkick Murphys

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Dropkick Murphys perform an acoustic set in front of a sold-out crowd at WGBH's Fraser Performance Studio.

7.title: Will Dailey

episode of.title: Front Row Boston: In Studio (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Boston-based Will Dailey performs live at WGBH's Fraser Performance Studio in Boston.

imdb.plot outline: WGBH and Front Row Boston present Front Row Boston: In Studio - a raw, intimate concert experience with energetic performances by local and national legends, and emerging talents.
